snap(-45,-33,-16)
sky(191,227,255)
fog(199,211,240)

ground(192,188,212)
texture(0,82,255,31)
fadefrom(5000)
density(5)

nlaps(1)
soundtrack(purple_dream_5,zip)
lightson()

name(Example Stage - with all the parts used in it)
